title: Santa Clara Home For Sale
description: For sale: $950,000. 4 bedroom Darvon Park home with spacious living room, separate family room and large kitchen and dining area. Living room features wood burning brick fireplace, large window, and hardwood floors. Kitchen is remodeled and features cherrywood Kraftmaid cabinets, silestone slab counters, undermount stainless steel sink and stainless steel appliances.  Newly carpeted family room features sliding glass door to back patio. Backyard is deep and features 2 pavered patios and spacious storage shed and lawn area.

facts.construction quality: 6.0 provided by the county assessor, this grade is based on a scale that varies by market. for more information, or to update the grade, contact the county assessor's office.
